twitch_info.title: Highlight: 259+ Hours of Enhanced Interrogation Techniques

message.body: lorema2SMOREc haha u died
RIP
have you seen how solved Elden Ring is already? LuL
we're learning about Game of Thrones today
yeah, I saw some runs
I expected as much
War of the Roses already?
covered that briefly
probably going to talk about it in more detail later
was reading about the Plantagenet line when I was reading that Shakespeare collection
I'm kicking ass at Thai today
what are you learning?
keyboard?
by the stream tomorrow I should be able to type whatever I see
yeah the keyboard layout
it's similar to several others
consonants on either side, vowels in the center. Common keyboard layout with East and South Asian languages
neat
once you can type you can learn vocab
like "homosexual"
gotta avoid gay sex by accident
my character can lez out all she wants
oh, I forget, you always make girls
nah I flip a coin
I always choose a random character
oh, huh. I never noticed
random sex, random class etc
cyberpunk has no classes right?
not really
just perk trees
that game is surprisingly good
I'm sure it would put me to sleep, but I'm glad you like it
I was worried it would be like witcher 1
just boring as shit
more like Witcher 3
this game is so cruel
final is so luck-based
in a game that is already very luckbased
on the bright side, I will be  a historian by the time this is over
yeah these lectures are pretty good
yeah, I try to find engaging speakers
some people just don't have the skill
even if they are qualified to teach
yeah
Daggerfall has a nascent system of court intrigue
where every named person is their own faction
I'm trying to make a dynamic system for that for RF
each member of a noble house is a faction within a faction and they plot and plan
the dwarf fortress dev is currently implementing something like that for his game
sounds like it has potential
yeah today I'm focused solely on faction AI and code
there's only 8 to start but eventually I want to have tons
and ultimately I want players to be able to make a faction from scratch
not just modded factions, but the ability to form a faction in-game
so I can bring people to the algosith faction?
you'll name it, set some policies, claim a hideout, establish with either the government or the underworld
yeah
and you can establish the skills that define the members of your faction
found a religion, or a guild, or a trading company
then immediately get destroyed by the existing power brokers
"I'm gonna start my own mages guild with blackjack and hookers"
*Mages Guild then bribes the magistrate to declare your guild illegal and sends endless waves of assassins at you*
sounds fun
then you build a castle wall of your enemies' skulls
maybe just metaphorically
construction doesn't sound like it will have construction as a game mechanic
I mean we can throw whatever we want in this game
did you get a chance to check out the town?
not yet, I'll do that sometime tomorrow
how will I find my block?
it has a giant A floating above it
ok, sounds logical
so your block is the default fencing location for stolen goods
that sounds like my playthroughs already
I steal everything
you can put whatever you want in it, but there will always be a criminal underground element
want to just make it the Thieves Guild HQ?
you've got 5 unique NPCs
It's a possibility, but it depends, will the game have a thieve's guild no matter what?
yes
one of the core 8 factions
ok, then it might as well be in my block then, make it so
so here's your people:
1) A Priest 2) A Ranger 3) A Warlock 4) A Grocer 5) A Physician
so there's a variety of activity in your district
so these people might each own a build of their own?
building*
yeah
they either live there, work there, or both
there's no temple in your district, so the Priest ideally just lives in your block
that priest is definitely not going to be a very godly one Keepo
but you still control him, so have editorial control over his doctrine
he's a furry btw
what kind?
haven't determined that yet
maybe he lives in the thieve's guild block because he's an outcast then
for being a furry and a foreigner
nah, he's the head of his temple
oh, ok
guess that would make sense
how far away is the temple?
let me check the map
there's a temple just south of your block
there's a total of 3
so how does the city feel about the thieve's guild? respected, hated?
nobody likes getting their shit took
of course
my idea for them was a straight-up mafia
but you can tweak them if you want
I would just prefer it to be a tad differentiated
like how?
you can make them noble Robin Hood types or horrible demon worshiping murderers
or anything in between

as long as it is not a carbon copy of tes, I really don't care. Maybe their motivations for theivery can be different (in tes it's a cult to nocturnal, I think), or maybe their focus (tes theive's guild does basically everything, maybe this one could specialize)
obviously it should be similar in it's mechanics
just lorewise, I think there should be a distinction
alright some of your other characters have subplots
The Fence is a Wood Elf, influential leader in the guild
you can make him the overall boss, or just a captain
is he one of the 5 npcs? or someone else?
the Warlock is a member of the assassin's guild. If you ever get a contract place on you as the player character, he will be tasked with murdering you
he's one of the 5
the ranger?
nah the Warlock
the ranger and fence are the same person, sorry
ok, got it
Ranger is his class, Fence his job
like the Priest is a "Warrior" in terms of stats
the Grocer is a member of Uncle Victor's faction but doesn't know it
he is brainwashed and used as a spy
who's that?
Uncle Victor is a liche who leads an undead faction
so the grocer is kind of like a thrall?
yeah
he's not a fighter, he's just used for his eyes and ears and to deliver messages
he has no idea
so his class is merchant or something like that?
and the Physician is a human woman who will be murdered by a serial killer unless the killer is stopped
Grocer's class is "Healer"
but he doesn't have magic so he is just a weak guy with a shit armor class
I'm sure there will be a quest marker that will take you directly to the serial killer's house, she'll be fine
nah
the moment you start a new game, the clock is ticking
how many of these global timers do you have planned ?
a lot
a lot of shit will be going on around you
so will the newgame be a laundry list of people to saveand the like before time runs out? Keepo
you won't be able to stop everything
players will just have to accept that
if you do save her, what does she do?
nothing special unless you want
but she's a doctor and can train the player in medicine as well as the Physician job
there's over 100 jobs
a "day job" for the player if they want
the ui can handle 100 quests at once?
or by job, you mean, like fencing and stuff?
you can be a carpenter or a tavern owner
a priest or a prostitute
or a fool
it's mostly for fun, but we can add perks
let's the player roleplay as a member of the community
how do you choose a job?
is it just picking it from a menu?
gotta find someone to teach you
apprenticeship program
even the town Idiot must train you to be an Idiot
that's nice
want to beg? become an apprentice Begger
then you can actually go around begging for money and food
learn the art of asking for a septim
or whatever the currency is
Carvils
"Please, a Carvil is but all I ask!"
Beggar actually sounds pretty neat
I mean, if you got sick like I did in Daggerfall and nobody would loan you money, you'd basically have to
I don't know much about real rpgs, but even in daggerfall, you cannot beg\
if you become a beggar everyone will treat you like shit, but you'll have a really low profile
a good way to evade any pursuers
you'll be modeling notoriety?
yeah
your profile will determine how easy you are to find, and who will risk fucking with you
let's say you're being hunted by a loan shark
and he's sending people after you
then you marry into a noble family
loan shark goons don't dare touch you now
so if your profile is really high, people will be on your back all the time?
it'll also affect how you get treated if you're captured
if you have a high profile, low rep, low class
not class as in character class
societal class
if you're a famous maniac with no friends you'll constantly be fending off your legion of enemies
but if you're married to the count's daughter, nobody but the most brazen will dare offend you
even if you're level 1 and don't carry a weapon
the only exception would be a god or Uncle Victor
how could you actually marry nobility if you're that weak?
Uncle Victor doesn't give a shit
high Charisma
spend all your efforts wooing her
of course, they don't let just anyone in the palace
today is the day
yes
I've already decided that whenever anyone says something like that I will just agree with them
what if i said it was not the day
then I would obviously say no Keepo
but seriously, all I need is to get better at shower and I'm set
of course, that's a big undertaking
that was a phase 3 pb by the way
I think
I think that's it for today
Thanks for watching everyone <3
